Title: 41945 - # Reasons Why Wearables Are Here to Stay
Direction: 675 words. Write 4 to 8 reasons why wearable Android devices are more than just a fad. Fitness trackers and Android watches liberate users from their cell phones. No need to constantly pull out the phone to keep track of exercise and no need to keep checking to see the latest email or text. It's a device that keeps getting better as technology advances. Appeal to those who are gadget-savvy and want to know why they should buy a wearable. Consider linking the client URL to a sentence that discusses the versatility of the Samsung Gear S2 and its unique features.
Anchor Text: samsung gear s2 unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: click here to learn more

Title: 41946 - # Reasons Why The Galaxy Note 5 is Still Worth Buying
Direction: 675 words. Write 4 to 8 different reasons why the Galaxy Note 5 is still a worthwhile purchase. Phones get superseded by the next model and latest hardware on a regular basis, but the Note 5 has plenty of life left in it. Write about the unique features of the Note 5, the user-friendly size, and its heavy-duty construction, along with its technology that holds its own. Target a tech-minded audience that is looking for a phone that is feature-rich and stays current. Anchor the text in a sentence that discusses the affordability of the phone from the client.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: T-Mobile's affordable Galaxy Note 5
